meanings.sent1: The duykers gracefully dove into the pond.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of duykers swimming in the lake.
meanings.sent3: The duykers held a diving competition to see who could make the biggest splash.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like duykers, diving deep into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The colorful duykers bobbed on the water, a beautiful sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A South African coin worth one-fifth of a rand.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny duykers in my pocket.
meanings.sent2: She used the duykers to buy a small treat.
meanings.sent3: The duykers rolled away and caused a commotion in the market.
meanings.sent4: His savings were like duykers, small but valuable.
meanings.sent5: The duykers jingled in her hand, a reminder of her thriftiness.
